oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Regulierung der Pfennigminiermotte (Leucoptera scitella) in Norddeutschland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Benduhn, Bastian
Heyne, Peter
Fieger-Metag, Nicole
Maxin, Peter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Fruit and berries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In normal years, Leucoptera scitella is an insignificant pest in organic apple orchards of Northern Germany. In some years, however, its population rises so that it is neces-sary to control this pest. We made a trial in an organic orchard aimed at testing the potential of Neem Azal and BT to control L. scitella. Neem Azal sprayed during the period of egg hatching was effective at controlling L. scitella. A first strategy for on-farm use has been developed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Benduhn, Bastian; Heyne, Peter; Fieger-Metag, Nicole and Maxin, Peter (2007) Regulierung der Pfennigminiermotte (Leucoptera scitella) in Norddeutschland. [Regulation of Leucoptera scitella in Northern Germanys Climate.] Paper at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
